### Carga de paquetes

Prueba

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

test <- read.csv("/data/test.csv")

ggplot(test, aes(id, num)) +
  geom_point(aes(colour = id)) +
  labs(
    title = "Titulo",
    subtitle = "Subtitulo",
    caption = "Data from test.csv"
  )

test
```
